title: getting mimetype of uploaded file fails
body:
upload of certain files via web interface look like they never complete when an error occures while getting the mimetype.

### expected behaviour
successfully upload file.
although an error message on failure would be nice.
### actual behaviour
the file is shown in the file list, but the "progress indicator" shows activity forever.
### steps to reproduce
just upload a file with an 'unknown' extension.
### server configuration
owncloud version: 4.5.7
### logs
```
warning: popen() has been disabled for security reasons in /path_to/owncloud/lib/helper.php on line 381
warning: fgets() expects parameter 1 to be resource, null given in /path_to/owncloud/lib/helper.php on line 382
warning: pclose() expects parameter 1 to be resource, null given in /path_to/owncloud/lib/helper.php on line 383
warning: popen() has been disabled for security reasons in /path_to/owncloud/lib/helper.php on line 381
warning: fgets() expects parameter 1 to be resource, null given in /path_to/owncloud/lib/helper.php on line 382
warning: pclose() expects parameter 1 to be resource, null given in /path_to/owncloud/lib/helper.php on line 383
warning: cannot modify header information - headers already sent by (output started at /path_to/owncloud/lib/helper.php:381) in /path_to/owncloud/lib/json.php on line 110
[{"status":"success","mime":"","size":"50270","id":"515","name":"filename.kdbx"}]
```
### notes
for my personal installation i fixed that problem by adding 

`&& oc_helper::is_function_enabled('popen')`

in helper.php at line  377
